tool_description: Easy Exchange Rates API between various currencies.
name: Exchange Rates
title: Exchange Rates

api_list.name: Exchange

optional_parameters.name: symbols
optional_parameters.description: Enter a list of comma-separated currency codes to limit output currencies; leave empty for display all. ex: USD,EUR,CZK

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description: Changing base currency. Enter the three-letter currency code of your preferred base currency.

api_list.name: Supported Symbols
api_list.description: This API returns a list of Supported Symbols in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com/supported_symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com/supported_symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
